form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT, Form No. 4-3-R0400

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/31/2023 Form Approved O.M.B. No. 43-R0400 APPLICATION FOR STATUS AS PERMANENT RESIDENT RECEIVEDSTAND File No. A21526239 APPLICATION FOR THE BENEFITS OF SECTION: 203(a)(7) and Sec. 245, I&N Act 245 DEC 16 1975 Sec. 214(d). I&N Act 249 I&N Act S. IMMIGRATION & NATURALIZATION BOSTON, MASS. 91369 Sec. 13, Act of 9/11/57 (DO NOT WRITE ABOVE THIS LINE.) (SEE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE FILLING IN APPLICATION. IF YOU NEED MORE SPACE TO ANSWER FULLY ANY QUESTION ON THIS FORM. USE A SEPARATE SHEET AND IDENTIFY EACH ANSWER WITH THE NUMBER OF THE CORRESPONDING QUESTION. FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) 1 hereby apply for the status of a lawful permanent resident alien on the following basis: (Check box A, B, C. D, E. or F) A. As a refugee to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available (Section 203(a)(7) and Section 245, I&N Act). B. As a former fiancee or fiance of a U.S. citizen whom I married within 90 days after my arrival in the United States, or as a child of such fiancee or fiance (Section 214(d). I&N Act). C. As a former government official, or as a member of the immediate family of such official (Section 13. Act of September 11. 1957). D. As a person to whom an immigrant visa is immediately available, other than one described above (Section 245, I&N Act). E. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since prior to July 1, 1924 (Section 249, I&N Act). F. As a person who has resided in the United States continuously since a date on or after July 1, 1924, but before June 30, 1948 (Section 249, I&N Act). 2 My name is (Last in capital letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) My alien registration number is Sex Male ATHI Ayodhabai Govindram (Apt. No.) A21526239 CA Female reside in the United States at: (No. and Street) PoeteRvillicity) (State) (ZIP Code) 134 Negnett 386 conley Rd Needham mass 02912 93257 4 Date of Birth Place of Birth (City or Town) (County, Province, or State) (Country) I am now a citizen of (Country) 7-18-1907 Varadsim, Maharashtra, India India 5. Mast arrived in the United States at the port of (City and State) on (Month) (Day) (Year) Boston Mass. 10-11-1975 by (Name of vessel or other means of travel) as a (visitor, student, exchange visitor, temporary worker, fiancee, fiance, crewman, 2 Swiss Airlines 164 parolee, etc.) Visitor was My last nonimmigrant visa issued outside the United States was issued by the American on (Month) (Day) (Year) I inspected. Consul at (City) (Country) was not Bombay, India Sept 17, 1975 6 1 am single married divorced widowed a. I have been married one times. including my present marriage, if now married. (If you are now married give the following:) b. Number of times my husband or wife has been married c. Name of husband or wife (Wife give maiden name) Drie LATHI, Govindram Totaram d. My husband or wife resides with me apart from me at Address (Apt. No.) (No. & Street) (Town or City) (Province or State) (County) 34 Noanett Rd, Needham, Mass, 02912 7 a. I have 4 sons or daughters as follows: (complete all columns as to each son or daughter; if living with you state "with me" in last column: otherwise give city and state or country of son's or daughter's residence). Name Sex Place of Birth Date of Birth Now living at Kamille LaThi Mane F Harigaon, India 7-26-33 386 Conley, Partenville, Calif Amarnath G. Lathi m Varadsim, India 6-7-36 461 Steeple Chase Lane, Bridewater Subhashchandra G. Lathi M Bombar India 10-26-38 34 Noanett Rd Needham Mass N.J. FOIA (b)(6) b. The following members of my family are also applying for permanent resident status: Husband - LATHI Gouindram Totaram A21526240 8. I have have not heretofore filed an application for the status of a permanent resident. (If you have ever filed such application, give the date and place of filing and final disposition.) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE TRANS IN RET'D TRANS RECEIVED Immigration and Naturalization Service OUT COMPLETED Form I-485 (Rev. 12-1-72) N (Page 1)
